game.name: Daemon: The Wolf, The Witch, and the Labyrinth
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Awaken as a lost soul bound to a cursed wolf. Journey through mist-shrouded islands, haunted ruins, and living forests where spirits whisper your name. Battle corrupted beasts and reclaim your humanity in a mythic action RPG of memory & rebirth.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Awaken as a lost soul bound to a cursed wolf. Journey through mist-shrouded islands, haunted ruins, and living forests where spirits whisper your name. Battle corrupted beasts and reclaim your humanity in a mythic action RPG of memory & rebirth.
